DataElement.preferredName: Adverse Event Performed Observation Outcome Treatment Emergent Flag ISO21090.BL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Specifies whether the adverse event is something that first arose or become more severe during the studied treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Adverse Event Performed Observation Outcome Treatment Emergent Flag
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended symptom, sign, or disease including an abnormal laboratory finding) temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure.  Such events can be intervention related, dose related, route related, patient related, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._Specifies whether the adverse event is something that first arose or became more severe during the studied treatment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended symptom, sign, or disease including an abnormal laboratory finding) temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure.  Such events can be intervention related, dose related, route related, patient related, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).
Executed and carried through to completion.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.

Property.preferredDefinition: Specifies whether the adverse event is something that first arose or became more severe during the studied treatment.

Concepts.definition: An indication as to whether an event began or was made worse by the treatment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released per model owner approval. mc 6/2013

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2/19/13 Added AIM Foundation Model CSI reference. jc
